GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A person is ~y~taking photos of the station~w~, speak with them to find out why.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~You:~w~ Hi there. What's going on here?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Nothing. Nothing at all.
~b~You:~w~ Put the camera down, I'd like to speak with-
~b~You:~w~ What's up? What's brought you here?
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm not doing anything illegal, please leave me be.
~b~You:~w~ I'm just trying to strike a conversation to understand what's going on.
~r~Suspect:~w~ And I'm just trying to do things, which are perfectly legal.
~b~You:~w~ I'd just like to speak with you.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Don't attempt to infringe my photography rights on public property.
~b~You:~w~ Hello, can I ask why you are taking photos of the station?
~r~Suspect:~w~ It was for my social media channel, is that okay?
~b~You:~w~ It is legal, yes, just rather odd to be doing for so long.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I understand, I'm done now so I'll move along.
~b~You:~w~ Cheers, thank you.

OUTCOME4.NOTIFICATION: Phone number has been received, and the initial investigations have begun. Thank you.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~You:~w~ Hi, what are you doing taking photos of the station?
~r~Suspect:~w~ You really want to know?
~b~You:~w~ Yes please, go ahead.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I realise how stupid I sound saying this, but someone, with the name of Jeff, texted me asking me to.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yeh, in hindsight that was a bit of a sketchy thing to do.
~b~You:~w~ I think we are both thinking the same thing. Can you give me their number?
~b~You:~w~ I think you ought to go home now, and possibly think about who you are speaking to.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yes, I understand. Sorry for the trouble.
~b~You:~w~ Hi, what are you doing taking photos of the station?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Hi Officer! I'm a huge fan of emergency services, and the work they do. I've just been taking some photos of your station, is that okay?
~b~You:~w~ I see, so this is some sort of hobby if I gather correctly?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Exactly! I wanted to be a police officer, but being on the other side of the station you can see it didn't go to plan.
~b~You:~w~ That's interesting to hear, I just wanted to check on you to figure out what was going on.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I can only apologise for wasting your time, but I've finished up my shots anyway, it looks pretty good if I say so myself.
~b~You:~w~ Not a problem in the slightest, I hope you have a wonderful rest of your day.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Well, off I go then. Maybe we'll cross paths some point in the future.
